subject: Re: junit beforeClass listener
msgSnippet: ... I think so.  Was it rejected by the moderator? ... Please Google for Junit feature request ... No promises.  I d love to release something before
messageBody:
On Wed, Oct 22, 2008 at 3:36 PM, <ishai@...> wrote:
> Hi David,
>
> I am sending this email because I see that my reply to you was not accepted so I put it also here.

I think so. Was it rejected by the moderator?

> How can I know if there is a feature request for it ?

Please Google for "Junit feature request"

> When the next release with feature will be release ?

No promises. I'd love to release something before February...

> Can you send patch for current version ? (We are working with 4.4)

4.5 is the latest

>
> Thanks
> Idan
